tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customers (
 customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 customer_name VARCHAR(50),
 behavior_segment VARCHAR(20),
 purchase_habits VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    customer_email VARCHAR(100),
    customer_phone VARCHAR(20),
    customer_behavior VARCHAR(200)
);

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    purchase_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    product_name VARCHAR(50),
    product_category VARCHAR(50)
);
CREATE TABLE CustomerSegmentation (   customer_id INT,   name VARCHAR(255),   behavior_category VARCHAR(50),   purchasing_habits VARCHAR(255) );
CREATE TABLE BehaviorPatterns (   pattern_id INT,   pattern_name VARCHAR(100),   description TEXT,   customer_id INT );
CREATE TABLE PurchasingHistory (   transaction_id INT,   customer_id INT,   purchase_date DATE,   total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) );

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    customer_email VARCHAR(100),
    customer_age INT,
    customer_gender VARCHAR(10),
    customer_behavior_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    order_date DATE,
    total_amount FLOAT,
    payment_method VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE purchase_history (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    quantity INT,
    total_price FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    registration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    purchase_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    product_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    category VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE customer_segments (
    segment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    segment_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE customer_behavior (
    behavior_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    behavior_type VARCHAR(50),
    behavior_date DATE
)
